sentences.sentence: No sucres will be printed or coined.
sentences.translation: 苏克雷货币不会印刷成纸币也不会铸成硬币。

sentences.sentence: No sucres will be printed or coined, but the virtual currency will be used to manage debts between the nine nations in a move to reduce reliance on the US dollar.
sentences.translation: 这种货币不会印刷成纸币也不会铸成硬币，可以用来处理各成员国之间的债务问题，同时还可减少对美元的依赖。
